T02TD3158E:179a-1: h'a la h'a la s'a dha nam /
T02TD3158E:179a-3: snying rje khros pa'i sgrub thabs /
T02TD3158E:179a-4: snying rje khros pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD3158E:179a-5: sngar bzhin du stong pa nyid kyi bar du bsgoms la /
T02TD3158E:179a-6: sa bon gyi yi ge hr'i: yongs su rdzogs pa las snying rje khros pa'i thugs rje chen po zhal gsum pa nyid yang spyan gsum pa ral pa dang dbu rgyan dang ldan pa ste /
T02TD3158E:179a-7: dang po'i zhal dkar pa g-yas pa sngo ba g-yon pa dmar ba zla ba phyed pa dang ldan pa'i dbu la thod pas thod byas pa ral pa'i mtha' na ri dags kyi pags pa rgyan thams cad kyis legs par brgyan pa shin tu dkar ba gangs kyi ri bo dang mtshungs par snang ba sgeg pa'i nyams dang ldan pas shin tu mdzes pa'o //
T02TD3158E:179a-8: zhal 'dzum pa dang ldan zhing phyag drug pa stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs mnabs pa ste /
T02TD3158E:179a-9: phyag g-yas pa ni mchog sbyin pa'o //
T02TD3158E:179a-11: gsum pa ni mda' gar thabs su bsnams pa'o //
T02TD3158E:179a-12: g-yon pa mi bskyod pa dang ldan pa'o //
T02TD3158E:179a-13: de bzhin du gnyis pas ni padma dkar po'o //
T02TD3158E:179a-14: gsum pas ni gzhu nyid do //
T02TD3158E:179a-15: pus mo g-yon pa nas mdog dkar pa'i lha mos brten pa ste /
T02TD3158E:179a-16: g-yon pas padma 'dzin pa phyag g-yas pas bcom ldan 'das la ched du 'khyud par mdzad pa'o //
T02TD3158E:179a-17: ral pa'i tshogs la me tog gis mdzes par gyur pa'o //
T02TD3158E:179a-18: g-yas kyi zur na sprul gyis dkris pa'i mdung rtse gsum pa'o //
T02TD3158E:179a-19: g-yon gyi zur na padma la gnas pa'i thod pa me tog dri zhim pa sna tshogs kyis legs par bkang ba'o //
T02TD3158E:179a-20: padma dmar po dang zla ba la g-yon bslang ba'i phyed krung gis bskyod par gnas pa'i bcom ldan 'das bsgom par bya ba'o //
T02TD3158E:179a-21: de nas gsang sngags bzlas par bya ste /
T02TD3158E:179a-22: aom badzra dharma hr'i: h'a la h'a la 'jig rten dbang phyug gi sgrub thabs rdzogs so /
